## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a87020f6a4aed44d59ba8a26ececf43e48cea644b9cb1a9d1a724b707fb86549)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'updox' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
